current.homepage_about_p1: We go through some strict processes as we weigh up everything from design and features, to interface and price. It means we bring for our customer what we believe is the best smartwatch in the market with great style, design and value for money. We use the highest quality components & an OLED display for Ex-Watch which stands out from others.
current.homepage_about_h2: WE ARE A NEW & TRUSTED NAME IN SMARTWATCH ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY
current.homepage_about_p2: We believe smart watches are the next revolution in tech gadgets because a watch should be able to tell you a lot more than just the time.

current.homepage_feature_2_sw_1_text: Explore our knowledgebase whenever you have any questions
current.homepage_feature_2_sw_2_text: Use our shop locator to find the nearest dealer
current.homepage_feature2_d1: Ex-Watch gives you an easy-to-read dashboard of tracking your activities. The Health app puts your data in one place, accessible with a tap, giving you a clear and current overview of your health & activities. It just might be the beginning of a health revolution.
current.homepage_feature2_d2: Receive & respond to notiﬁcations in an instant. Track your daily activity. Control your music with using only your voice. Pay for groceries just like that. With Ex-Watch, important information and essential features are always just a raise of the wrist away.
current.homepage_feature2_d3: How many times it happened that you missed an important call or text? How many times have you  rushed to the phone and it was an unimportant call or a text. Thanks to the Ex-Watch, and the ability to either pick up or dismiss these alerts in no-time.
current.homepage_featurem_p1: Ex-Watch allows you to get connected with your friends and family members where ever you are. It also tells you what's nearby. You'll get notifications in real-time and you don't have to go into the apps.
current.homepage_featurem_p2: Ex-Watch also let you store your favourite contacts for quick access. You can add them easily in watch app and can build groups of friends & family for sending quick messages or make voice calls.
current.homepage_feature_apps_heading:
experience great Built-in apps in your
eXwatch
current.homepage_feature_apps_d1: To start a workout, get directions, or check your schedule just ask and it lets you do the things you do every day easily.
current.homepage_feature_apps_d2: Get detailed measurements & a sense of accomplishment and when you close your Move, Exercise, and Stand rings.
current.homepage_feature_apps_d3: Sleep Timer lets you fall asleep to your favorite music. You simply start your music, and then set the countdown timer.
current.homepage_feature_specs_rd3:
Indoor Running, Outdoor Running, Cycling
Dedicated Bike Mount, Swimming
current.homepage_feature_specs_ld5: Backlit LCD with the ability to invert
current.homepage_feature_specs_rd5:
EX SportWatch GPS, Extra Strapes
USB charging cable, Quick start guide
current.homepage_feature_specs_ld7:
High-sensitivity receiver, Vibration alert,
Music control, Find my phone
current.homepage_featuren_heading: everything you need, is on your wrist
current.homepage_featuren_h1: connect with desktop, laptop or mobile
current.homepage_featuren_p1: Get Your favourite apps like messaging, social media, news & music automatically sync with your watch.
current.homepage_feature_slider2_p1: Setting the Ex-Watch up is quick and easy. Almost all of the Watch’s features rely on a link to your smartphone. Just connect the Ex-Watch with your phone through bluetooth and launch the Watch app. It connects!
current.slide_1_text: The best smartwatch technology that helps you to connect between your work and life. ALWAYS STAY CONNECTED!
current.slide_2_title:
wear it & love it!
daily life companion
